Body:
An eminent linguist Ashok Kelkar has made a rather detailed analysis of "Marathi baby talk".

http://www.ciil-ebooks.net/html/Kelkar2/kelkar/b29.htm

Take a look at point 3 onwards, you will find the vocabulary and whatnot. I agree that it is only for Marathi, but it is not restricted to one baby, and I, as a native Marathi speaker, can vouch for the ubiquity of the vocabulary given by him.

यावज्जीवही "काय मी" न कळले आप्तांप्रती नीटसें;

कोठे आणि कधीतरी जगति मी होऊन गेलो असें.......

-राम गणेश गडकरी
